AI Description: Nanopolish is a software package for signal-level analysis of Oxford Nanopore sequencing data. It provides tools for basecalling, mapping, and variant calling from raw nanopore signal data.
Core Features: Basecalling of raw Oxford Nanopore signal data
Alignment of nanopore reads to a reference genome
Variant calling to detect single nucleotide variants and indels
Methylation detection from nanopore sequencing data
